column1: #Text=We spend an inordinate amount of time and money intervening in the affairs of other nations .

#Text=What if we were to redirect our efforts and capital toward improving vital issues at home ( i. e. , our homeless , our displaced veterans , illiteracy and poverty ( which continue to hover around 15 % ) , the availability of health care for every American , etc. ) ?

#Text=We could lead by example rather than try to convince the rest of the world why it should follow our model , and at the same time , we would be taking care of our citizens and restoring hope and dignity to their lives .
#Text=If elected , what would constitute a successful presidency for you ?
#Text=: Simplistically , if I could make meaningful progress toward achieving the goals I just listed , I would have a successful presidency .
#Text=" I do n't need to serve in a political office to be happy , but I would be honored to do so if I thought I could give something back to my country .

#Text=To give you some perspective , I once wanted to fly a large American flag over one of my car dealerships , but the city 's governing body emphatically said ,  No !
